alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 29 at 9:46AM MST until November 29 at 10:15AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1015 AM MST. * At 946 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 17 miles east of Walsenburg to Spring Burn Scar south of Highway 160 in Huerfano county, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, northeastern Spring Burn Scar south of Highway 160 in Huerfano county, Walsenburg and La Veta. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
